data.description_html:
You create a loud noise equivalent to a peal of thunder and its accompanying shock wave.
The spell has three effects.
First, all creatures in the area must make Will saves to avoid being stunned for 1 round.
Second, the creatures must make Fortitude saves or be deafened for 1 minute.
Third, they must make Reflex saves or fall prone.
Focus: An iron bell.
data.name: Great Thunderclap
